newsitem.title: USA: Golden Books stake cut by Gabelli group.
newsitem.headline: Golden Books stake cut by Gabelli group.

text.p: A group led by New York investment manager Mario Gabelli said Wednesday it cut its stake in Golden Books Family Entertainment Inc to 4,538,235 common shares, or 17.91 percent, from 19.05 percent previously held.

In a filing with the Securities and Exchange Commission, the group said its latest transactions include a net 111,928 common shares sold between October 16 and December 16 at prices ranging from $10.81 to $12.1438 per share.
Golden Books, headquartered in New York, is the largest publisher of children's books in the North American retail market.
